Requirements You are wielding a finesse weapon or polearm

While your opponent is still recovering from your prior attack, you snag its armor, clothing or flesh to move it as you please. Make a melee Strike with a finesse weapon or polearm. If you hit a target that is your size or smaller, you can automatically Reposition it, with the same benefits as the Reposition action (including the critical success effect, if your Strike was a critical hit). If you used a weapon with reach, use the weaponâ€™s reach for this Reposition.

This Strike has the following failure effect.

Failure The target becomes off-guard until the end of your current turn.
